solution_line_template: If Kristoff has {kristoff_stickers} stickers, Riku has {riku_times_more} * {kristoff_stickers} stickers = <<{kristoff_stickers}*{riku_times_more}={riku_more_stickers}>>{riku_more_stickers} more stickers.

The total number of stickers Riku has is {riku_more_stickers} stickers + {kristoff_stickers} stickers = <<{riku_more_stickers}+{kristoff_stickers}={total_riku_stickers}>>{total_riku_stickers} stickers
